original_text:
Does one crush grain for bread?
    No, he does not thresh it forever;
when he drives his cart wheel over it
    with his horses, he does not crush it.
korean_text: 곡식은 부수는가, 아니라 늘 떨기만 하지 아니하고 그것에 수레바퀴를 굴리고 그것을 말굽으로 밟게 할지라도 부수지는 아니하나니

sentences.original_text: Does one crush grain for bread?
he does not thresh it forever
when he drives his cart wheel over it with his horses
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 말들로 그 수레 바퀴를 그것 위로 몰 때
